title: PCK Enhancement Workshop for Prospective Physics Teachers: CoMCoRe-LS-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Job-integrated training program for corporate education managers

learning_goals: Core concepts and instructional strategies in physics are systematically structured using Concept Map-based Content Representation (CoMCoRe)

Learners can collect feedback from peers at least three times through the Lesson Study (LS) process over one week, reflect on it, and submit a final effective lesson design plan according to the 5-stage instructional design framework (Goal Setting-Activity Design-Assessment Tool Development-Feedback Application-Final Revision).
A project to develop integrated classroom activities applying PCK components (curriculum understanding, student perspective understanding, pedagogical execution) is completed
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
